price: 68. Jie tarė: „Sudeginkit jį ir padėkit savo aliha (dievams), jei darysite.“
arabic: قَالُواْ حَرِّقُوهُ وَٱنصُرُوٓاْ ءَالِهَتَكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ فَٰعِلِينَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū ḥarriqūhu wa-unṣurū ālihatakum in kuntum fāʿilīna
